column4: is an airport located at 10 kilometres (6.2 mi) in the southern outskirt of Bima
column7: Indonesia. Garuda Indonesia (Operated by Explore Garuda) offers schedule commercial flights to Lombok from this Airport. Wings Air provide flight to Denpasar
column8: Lombok and Makassar from this Airport while Susi Air provide flights to Labuan Bajo and Waingapu from here. The airport resides at an elevation of 1 m (3 ft) above mean sea level. It has one runway designated 13/31 with an asphalt surface measuring 1
column10: 413 ft) in length. Address: Jalan Sumbawa Belo Palibelo
